title: Hanayome-Kun
alternative_title: 花嫁くん ; 花嫁君 ; Hanayome kun ; Mr. Flower Bride
status: 花嫁くん ; 花嫁君 ; Hanayome kun ; Mr. Flower Bride
description:
Description :
        From Yen Press: Shinji Souda’s not exactly happy about his family’s age-old marriage customs, namely the fact that he has to marry a boy! Will a sudden confession from his bride-to-be, a beautiful boy in his class named Aoi, make Shinji change his mind? This sweet love story follows the couple through their marriage ceremony, wedding night, life as newlyweds, and even childbirth!
